#~~~ Auto generated by gen_cmake_recursively.py @ 2012-07-20 15:28:55.806482 ~~~
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)
project(jadesoul)

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -std=c++0x")

#add_subdirectory


#include_directories
include_directories(../../include)

#for each target
add_executable(ml_cluster ml_cluster.cpp)
add_custom_command(
	TARGET ml_cluster
	POST_BUILD
	COMMAND python ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/scripts/move_target.py ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR} ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} ml_cluster
	COMMENT "Postbuild action : move target ml_cluster"
)
